description: Query and configure NVIDIA/Mellanox network adapter firmware configuration parameters. Used for setting device parameters such as SRIOV, VPI port configuration, PCI settings, and other firmware-level options that persist across reboots.

installation.notes: Part of Mellanox Firmware Tools (MFT). Install via MLNX_OFED package or download from NVIDIA website. Requires MST driver.

global_options.description: Answer yes to all questions (non-interactive mode)

subcommands.name: set
subcommands.description: Set configuration parameters (requires reboot to take effect)

subcommands.name: reset
subcommands.description: Reset all configuration parameters to default values

subcommands.name: backup
subcommands.description: Backup current configuration to a file

subcommands.name: restore
subcommands.description: Restore configuration from a backup file

common_usage_patterns.description: Set port to Ethernet mode (VPI cards)

error_messages.meaning: MST driver not loaded or device path incorrect
error_messages.resolution: Run 'mst start' to load MST driver, verify device path with 'mst status'

error_messages.meaning: Changes will not take effect until device is reset
error_messages.resolution: Reboot system or use mlxfwreset to apply changes

error_messages.meaning: Parameter name is not valid for this device
error_messages.resolution: Use 'mlxconfig -d <device> query' to see valid parameters

interoperability.notes: Configuration changes require reboot or mlxfwreset to take effect. SRIOV changes affect VM/container network configurations.

permissions.write_operations: Root required for all configuration changes
permissions.notes: Changes are persistent across reboots and stored in device firmware

limitations: Changes require reboot or firmware reset to take effect
Some parameters are device-specific and may not be available on all adapters
SRIOV changes affect running VMs if VFs are in use
VPI port type changes require link down

reads_from.description: Queries device configuration that affects IB state
Configuration options depend on firmware version

writes_to.description: Can change port type between IB and Ethernet (after reboot)
Stores configuration in device firmware NVM

consistent_with.shared_state: Port type reflects LINK_TYPE setting after reboot
Link parameters consistent with mlxconfig settings
